element.name: Primary Symptom
element.definition: The primary sign and symptom present in the patient or observed by EMS personnel
element.v3Comment:
eSituation.02 (Possible Injury), eSituation.09 (Primary Symptom), eSituation.07 (Chief Complaint Anatomic Location), and eSituation.08 (Chief Complaint Organ System) are grouped together to form the EMS Reason for Encounter.
Code list is represented in ICD-10-CM Diagnosis Codes. Reference the NEMSIS Suggested Lists at: http://nemsis.org/v3/resources.html
ICD-10-CM
Website - http://uts.nlm.nih.gov
Product - UMLS Metathesaurus
